data.title: Arizona Sports
meta_keywords: Phoenix Arizona Sports News | Phoenix Breaking Sports News
data.meta_description: Bickley & Marotta host and long-time Arizona Sports columnist Dan Bickley's opinions on the Phoenix Suns, Arizona Cardinals and more.
data.text:
Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Enough homer babble, time to look at the Arizona Cardinals by the numbers

After differing headlines come out of the Arizona Cardinals' joint practice with the Indianapolis Colts, Dan Bickley has had enough of the homer babble from local media and explains why it's time to let the numbers speak for themselves heading into the season ahead.

15 hours ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Why Diamondbacks’ hot streak should rekindle fans’ excitement that Arizona could be a playoff team

The Arizona Diamondbacks secured their fifth straight win after Jake McCarthy punched in a walk-off single for a 4-3 win over the Colorado Rockies on Tuesday. Dan Bickley explains why the D-backs' hot streak since the All-Star break could be fueling fans' belief that this team is not afraid as they move up the National League standings.

2 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Should the Arizona Cardinals consider a Haason Reddick reunion?

Should the Arizona Cardinals consider a Haason Reddick reunion? Dan Bickley explores during his Bickley Blast.

3 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Why Olympic performances from Phoenix Suns, Mercury should give fans hope

Following standout performances on the world stage at the Paris Olympics from Phoenix Mercury stars Diana Taurasi, Brittney Griner and Kahleah Copper, as well as Suns stars Kevin Durant and Devin Booker, Dan Bickley says Mat Ishbia and fans should be hopeful for a championship in Phoenix.

4 days ago

Dan Bickley

Paris Olympics’ display of celebration keeps Olympic dream alive

The 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris keeps Olympic dream alive in display of celebration, Dan Bickley writes.

4 days ago

Dan Bickley

Phoenix Suns win big at Summer Olympics in Paris

The Phoenix Suns' Kevin Durant and Devin Booker win big at Summer Olympics as Team USA wins Olympic gold, Dan Bickley writes.

5 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: All eyes are on Devin Booker and Kevin Durant at Olympics

As Devin Booker and Kevin Durant continue to make their mark on the U.S. men's basketball team, Dan Bickley feels this will serve them both well once they get back to Arizona and start preparations for the coming NBA season.

7 days ago

Dan Bickley

It’s time to take the Diamondbacks World Seriously

The Diamondbacks are now 63-52 and once again the toast of Arizona. It’s time to take them seriously. World Seriously, Dan Bickley writes.

8 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Is Kevin Durant’s, Devin Booker’s Olympic experience fueling or cooling the drive to win in Arizona?

After Devin Booker called Kevin Durant "Captain America" following the star forward's Olympic record-setting night in a blowout win over Brazil, Dan Bickley ponders if Team USA's success in Paris will leave the Phoenix Suns stars content with winning gold or fuel their drive to bring a championship to Arizona.

9 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Devin Booker’s summer is helping re-shape the national narrative around him

Bickley Blast: Devin Booker's summer is helping re-shape the national narrative around him.

10 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Do the Arizona Cardinals have a plan to replace the injured BJ Ojulari?

The Arizona Cardinals on Friday suffered a serious blow defensively with the loss of second-year pass rusher BJ Ojulari to a torn ACL. Dan Bickley and Vince Marotta ponder if the Cardinals have a plan to replace the injured linebacker as the season approaches.

11 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Why the Arizona Diamondbacks can’t afford to let Paul Sewald close another game

After Arizona Diamondbacks closer Paul Sewald almost blew another game that would have prevented the sweep of the National Washington's, Dan Bickley explains why Torey Lovullo can't afford for Sewald to close another game.

15 days ago

Dan Bickley

Diamondbacks equipped for stretch run after great trade deadline

A wild July is in the books. Major League Baseball’s trade deadline has expired. Mike Hazen has earned an ‘A' for his trade deadline.

15 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: The Arizona Diamondbacks are surging into August after ending July hot at the plate

After shutting out the Washington Nationals 17-0 Tuesday night in Phoenix, the Arizona Diamondbacks are heading into August as one of the hottest teams in baseball. Dan Bickley breaks down it down by the numbers.

16 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Could the Diamondbacks’ remarkable comeback be a turning point for Corbin Carroll?

After Corbin Carroll pinch-hit his first walk-off home run in the Arizona Diamondbacks' win over the Washington Nationals on Monday, Dan Bickley ponders if this is the turning point for the center fielder to break out of his sophomore slump.

17 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Phoenix Suns look more well-rounded after Tyus Jones signing

Bickley Blast: Phoenix Suns look more well-rounded after Tyus Jones signing says Dan Bickley.

18 days ago

Dan Bickley

Kevin Durant, Tyus Jones headline glorious weekend for Suns fans

This weekend was a great turn of events for Suns fans with a Hall of Fame Kevin Durant performance at the Olympics and a new point guard.

19 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Diamondbacks GM Mike Hazen making moves to set team up for more success

With the addition of reliever A.J. Puk, Diamondbacks general managers Mike Hazen has shown that he is doing whatever's necessary to improve the team's chances for making the playoffs again.

21 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Diamondbacks GM Mike Hazen making big moves to tighten up the bullpen

With the addition of reliever A.J. Puk, Diamondbacks general manager Mike Hazen is doing everything he can to strengthen their bullpen, much to the delight of Dan Bickley, who knows the team's success hinges on strong relievers.

21 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Diamondbacks’ Ketel Marte on the road to superstardom

Arizona Diamondbacks infielder Ketel Marte is having an outstanding season so far, one that Dan Bickley believes can turn into an MVP type season for Marte if he stays on his current path.

22 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Diamondbacks’ Ketel Marte on the road to superstardom

Diamondbacks infielder Ketel Marte is having a fantastic season, one that has Dan Bickley believing Marte can be a legitimate MVP candidate if he stays the course.

22 days ago

Dan Bickley

Do the Cardinals have momentum heading into the 2024 season?

The Cardinals seem to have momentum entering the 2024 season. It’s hard to believe and even harder to accomplish.

22 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Excitement for Arizona Cardinals grows but it’s time for this team to deliver wins

Arizona Cardinals head coach Jonathan Gannon and general manager Monti Ossenfort have enjoyed a long honeymoon but Dan Bickley explains why the coming season will need to deliver wins for a fan base excited to see Kyler Murray and company return to the field.

23 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Suns fans want Kevin Durant to worry about winning an NBA Championship, not Olympics

Kevin Durant missed the final exhibition game for Team USA ahead of the Paris Olympics with a lingering calf injury, but Dan Bickley explains why Phoenix Suns fans would rather the star forward focus on rest and healing for a run at an NBA title than worrying about him staying healthy throughout the Summer Games.

24 days ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Do Phoenix Suns fans have the patience to see Mat Ishbia’s 3-year plan through?

Phoenix Suns owner Mat Ishbia joined Burns & Gambo to explain his three-year plan for the organization on Wednesday. Dan Bickley ponders if fans have enough patience to see the entire plan all the way through.

29 days ago

Dan Bickley

Several themes swirl around Diamondbacks at All-Star break

The Arizona Diamondbacks have several questions facing them at the All-Star break with a turning point looming.

1 month ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: How Diamondbacks’ Torey Lovullo, Ketel Marte can seize MLB All-Star Game opportunity

Arizona skipper Torey Lovullo will lead the National League team for the 2024 MLB All-Star Game while Ketel Marte starts at second base. Dan Bickley explains how the two D-backs' representatives can make the most of their time on the national stage.

1 month ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Diamondbacks ‘better make the playoffs or else’

The Arizona Diamondbacks are in Wild Card contention despite everything that could've derailed the team in the first half of the season. Dan Bickley is expecting big things for the team after the All-Star break, including another playoff berth.

1 month ago

Arizona Sports Video

Video: Bickley Blast: Is there something magical ahead for Diamondbacks?

Despite everything that's gone on in the first half of the season for the Arizona Diamondbacks, they're still in striking distance of a Wild Card spot in the National League. Dan Bickley wonders if this team can catch lightning in a bottle after the All-Star break, and make another run to the playoffs.

1 month ago
